name: Pathrise
headline: YC for your career
description: Pathrise is a career accelerator where you don't pay unless you land a job. Job seekers sign up for Pathrise to get weekly career coaching, access the Pathrise network and use our job search automation software.
generated_description:
**Pathrise: Your Career Accelerator**

Founded in 2017 and part of Y Combinator Batch S17, Pathrise operates out of San Francisco with a team of 55 dedicated professionals. Their mission? To be the Y Combinator of your career. 

Pathrise stands out as a career accelerator that only requires payment once you land a job—transforming the job-seeking experience into a partnership. Their approach combines robust weekly coaching, a powerful network, and advanced job search automation software to enhance your chances of landing the job you want.

With an average junior base salary of around $83,307 and seniors pulling in about $199,896, Pathrise has helped over 2,700 fellows across various backgrounds secure competitive positions in the job market. Their services cater to multiple industries, including Software Engineering, Data Science, Marketing, Finance, and more.

What’s impressive about Pathrise is their model of mentorship. Mentors work in significant tech companies such as Google, Amazon, and Microsoft, offering insider knowledge that can help you navigate hiring processes and ace interviews. This means when you’re working with them, you’re getting guidance from seasoned professionals who know the landscape.

The process is straightforward: you apply and get started on your career journey. The team works with you on resume crafting, interview strategies, and offer negotiations—all while ensuring that you only pay if you succeed. Plus, with various flexible financing options, including income-based repayment models, your financial security is considered.

In sum, Pathrise isn't just about finding a job; it’s about transforming your approach to career advancement, offering tangible outcomes and a supportive community dedicated to helping you succeed. For those ready to take the plunge, visit [Pathrise](https://www.pathrise.com) and start reshaping your career today.
